channel.title: [tut] Full c4d sig! (may kill you 56kers out there)
channel.description:
Well. I got like 2 requests on my sprite sig thread, so i thought why not make one? So here it is people. How to make a c4d sig. (it's like 414k I think.. so.. yeah >.>) Sorry for the bad quality. Had to compress it >.<
[img]http://img478.imageshack.us/img478/6466/tutorialqp5.gif[/img]
